alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 11:34AM AKST until February 15 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle is occurring. Additional ice accumulation up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. Be prepared for slippery roads, driveways, and sidewalks. Slow down and use caution while driving. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Persistent freezing drizzle has already created a coating of ice across most of Anchorage. Steady drizzle will persist into the early afternoon hours and then is expected gradually diminish. Temperatures will rise to around or even above freezing, though area road surfaces are colder, so icy conditions will persist through the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
